subject: Apply code standards audit: track TODO in docs, remove inline TODO comment
body:
- Removed inline TODO comment from App.jsx:94 (tracked in docs/TODO.md)
- Added 3 audit findings to docs/TODO.md:
  - Calculate imageAspectRatio from first image (was untracked TODO)
  - Sanitize markdown HTML output (dangerouslySetInnerHTML security note)
  - Extract large components exceeding 800-line threshold
